meanings.sent1: The undissociated puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent2: The undissociated wires caused a short circuit.
meanings.sent3: The undissociated socks kept disappearing in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: Her undissociated thoughts formed a clear picture in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The undissociated magnets attracted each other strongly.

meanings.definition: Not broken down into simpler parts.
meanings.sent1: The undissociated compound remained stable under heat.
meanings.sent2: The undissociated food particles were too large to be absorbed.
meanings.sent3: The undissociated jigsaw puzzle was challenging to complete.
meanings.sent4: His undissociated argument was concise and convincing.
meanings.sent5: The undissociated rock formation stood tall against erosion.

meanings.definition: Not dissociated or separated from a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The undissociated team worked together seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The undissociated members shared a common goal.
meanings.sent3: The undissociated choir sang in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her undissociated loyalty to the company was commendable.
meanings.sent5: The undissociated branches of the organization supported each other.
